price: 34. Ee ha keenaan hadal la mid ahi (Qur’aankani) hadday run sheegayaan.
arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falyatū biḥadīthin mith'lihi in kānū ṣādiqīna
